SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientcontroller

Class SerializeDeserialize

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientcontroller.SerializeDeserialize
All Implemented Interfaces:
SerializeDeserializeInterface
public class SerializeDeserialize extends Object implements SerializeDeserializeInterface
The SerializeDeserialize class is responsible for serializing and deserializing TCP messages using Gson library.

    • deserialize

      public void deserialize(String input) throws IOException, URISyntaxException
      Deserializes the input string to a TCPMessage object and passes it to the TCPMessageController for processing.
      Specified by:
      deserialize in interface SerializeDeserializeInterface
      Parameters:
      input - The input string to be deserialized.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O exception occurs.
      URISyntaxException - if the URI syntax is invalid.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
